CustomField.formula:
IMAGE( CASE(TEXT(copado__Status__c),
'Potential Conflict', '/resource/' & IF($Setup.copado__Settings__c.copado__Namespace__c!='none','copado__', '') & 'Statics/img/icons/warning16.png',
'Back Promoted', '/resource/' & IF($Setup.copado__Settings__c.copado__Namespace__c!='none','copado__', '') & 'Statics/img/icons/warning16.png',
'Conflict Resolved', '/resource/' & IF($Setup.copado__Settings__c.copado__Namespace__c!='none','copado__', '') & 'Statics/img/icons/confirm16.png',
'Under Review', '/resource/' & IF($Setup.copado__Settings__c.copado__Namespace__c!='none','copado__', '') & 'Statics/img/icons/loading.gif',
'On Hold', '/resource/' & IF($Setup.copado__Settings__c.copado__Namespace__c!='none','copado__', '') & 'Statics/img/icons/warning16.png',
'/s.gif'),
TEXT(copado__Status__c) )
CustomField.label: Status Icon
